item.title: Alaric Adranus
item.description: Name: Alaric Adranus Homeworld: Battlefleet Calixis Career: Imperial Psyker Rank: Sanctionite Gender: Male Build: Gaunt Skin Color: Fair Hair Color: Black Eye Color: Watery Blue Age: 37 Quirk: None Ship Tradition: War Ship Divination: Know the mutant; kill the mutant. Starting XP: 400 Starting Package: None Traits: Shipwise, Void Accustomed, Naval Lineage Skills, Close-Quarter Fighter, Officer on Deck, Sanctioned Psyker Basic Skills: Navigation (Stellar) (Int) (Shipwise), Pilot (Starcraft) (Ag) (Shipwise), Common Lore (Tech) (Int) (Nav.
